description: Model parameters used for simulation. These are NOT experimental facts. They can be adjusted. Evidence dataset is stored separately.

assumptions.name: reference_frequency_mhz
assumptions.source: Methodical recommendations mention 2450 MHz equipment class

assumptions.name: optimal_seed_working_temp_c
assumptions.source: Methodical recommendations mention typical working seed temperature ~30-40C

assumptions.name: overheat_threshold_c
assumptions.source: Not directly fixed in the provided sources; used as a safety penalty threshold.

assumptions.name: noise_enabled_default
assumptions.source: Used for demo variability. Must be switchable OFF.
